installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Installing steamcmd.."
echo "deb http://mirrors.linode.com/debian stretch main non-free" >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo "deb-src http://mirrors.linode.com/debian stretch main non-free" >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo steamcmd steam/question select "I AGREE" | debconf-set-selections
echo steamcmd steam/license note '' | debconf-set-selections
sleep 1

EX=""

if [ ! -z "$SPECIAL_BRANCH" ]; then
    EX="-beta $SPECIAL_BRANCH"
    if [ ! -z "$BRANCH_PASSWORD" ]; then
        EX="-beta $SPECIAL_BRANCH -betapassword $BRANCH_PASSWORD"
    fi
fi

dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt-get update
apt-get install lib32gcc1 wget curl tar whiptail steamcmd nodejs -y
sleep 1

cd /mnt/server

#curl -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
#tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz
#sleep 1

/usr/games/steamcmd +force_install_dir /mnt/server/scp_server +login anonymous +app_update 996560 validate $EX +quit &&
echo "Downloading EXILED.."
if [ -f Exiled.Installer-Linux ]; then
    rm -rf Exiled.Installer-Linux
fi

wget https://github.com/Exiled-Team/EXILED/releases/latest/download/Exiled.Installer-Linux
echo "Installing EXILED.."
ls
chmod +x Exiled.Installer-Linux
EXTRA=""
if [ $PRE_RELEASE == 1 ]; then
    EXTRA="--pre-releases"
fi
if [ ! -z "$EXILED_VER" ]; then
    EXTRA="--target-version $EXILED_VER"
fi

if [ "$EXILED_VER" != "-1" ]; then
    ./Exiled.Installer-Linux -p /mnt/server/scp_server --appdata /mnt/server/.config --pre-releases --exit
fi
echo "Installing Discord Integration bot.."
if [ ! -d "DiscordIntegration" ]; then
    mkdir DiscordIntegration
    cd DiscordIntegration
    wget https://github.com/Exiled-Team/DiscordIntegration/releases/latest/download/DiscordIntegration.bot
    mkdir logs
fi

cd scp_server

if [ ! -d "/mnt/server/.config" ]; then
    mkdir "/mnt/server/.config"
fi

if [ ! -d "/mnt/server/.config/SCP Secret Laboratory" ]; then
    mkdir "/mnt/server/.config/SCP Secret Laboratory"
fi

if [ ! -d "/mnt/server/scp_server/servers/server1" ]; then
    mkdir -p "/mnt/server/scp_server/servers/server1"
fi

echo "Installation complete!"
